page.title: 18Fads and Crazes
page.content:
At the moment the thing to have is a {BMX bike.} These are pedal bicycles especially designed for trick riding and cross-country. Out of sixteen boys in our class ten have got BMX bikes. They are great fun. There are even national competitions to find the best riders.
Lots of us have got or are getting {roller-boots.}These are like roller-skates but the rollers are fixed to a pair of boots which you have to put on. The wheels are made of nylon. You can go very fast on them. We are allowed to bring them to school and skate on the school terrace at play-time. Sometimes we fall over and cut our knees. Mr Peach says he's going to start charging us for all the plasters we use from the first-aid.
